metadata.name: Tecno Holi : Colourful Madness
metadata.description:
Holi is a festival that has always been celebrated with a lot of zeal and zest, energy and enthusiasm. After documenting this festival for a long time I've always looked for that one frame that is one in a million shot for me.

This year finally, I was able to get this moment. A moment of a split second that you just have to be there to experience, I was able to capture it in my lens and mark it. This image has been published on international platforms and widely recognised.
